sentences.en: an area of spectacular natural beauty
sentences.cn: 自然风景秀丽的地区

sentences.en: death from natural causes
sentences.cn: 自然死亡

sentences.en: He said that the decision flew in the face of natural justice.
sentences.cn: 他说这个决定有悖天理。

sentences.en: His natural shrewdness tells him what is needed to succeed.
sentences.cn: 他与生俱来的精明告诉他成功所需要的一切。

sentences.en: I think they saw it as a natural progression for me.
sentences.cn: 我想他们认为这对我来说是顺理成章的。

sentences.en: In its natural habitat, the hibiscus will grow up to 25ft.
sentences.cn: 在原生境中，木槿能长到25英尺高。

sentences.en: It is only natural that he should resent you.
sentences.cn: 他怨恨你是很自然的事。

sentences.en: It would force industries to be more careful with natural resources.
sentences.cn: 这将迫使企业更加节约资源。

sentences.en: Janet was a natural blonde with a good figure.
sentences.cn: 珍妮特天生一头金发，身材曼妙。

sentences.en: Lorenzo was a natural leader who made friends easily.
sentences.cn: 洛伦佐是天生的领袖，善于交友。

sentences.en: Mainline feminism was arguing for the inherent beauty of the natural woman.
sentences.cn: 主流女权主义思想倡导女性天生的自然美。

sentences.en: Natural disasters have obvi-ously contributed to the continent's economic crisis.
sentences.cn: 很显然，自然灾害也是造成该大陆经济危机的原因之一。

sentences.en: The ball is made of rattan — a natural fibre.
sentences.cn: 这个球是由一种天然纤维——省藤制成的。

sentences.en: The gigantic natural harbour of Poole is a haven for boats.
sentences.cn: 巨型天然港普尔港是船只的避风港。

sentences.en: the need for natural light in offices
sentences.cn: 办公室里需要自然光的照射

sentences.en: the study of the natural world
sentences.cn: 对自然界的研究

sentences.en: the study of the natural world
sentences.cn: 对自然界的研究

sentences.en: There is little assessment of the damage to the natural environment.
sentences.cn: 几乎未对自然环境破坏程度作出评估。

sentences.en: They will only triumph by persevering in their struggle against natural calamities.
sentences.cn: 他们只有坚持与自然灾害搏斗， 才能取得胜利。

sentences.en: This feeling seems to be natural.
sentences.cn: 这种感触似乎是自然的。

sentences.en: Vintage ports must be decanted to remove natural sediments.
sentences.cn: 上等的波尔图葡萄酒必须倒入其他容器中以滤除自然沉淀物。

sentences.en: We should tap natural resources.
sentences.cn: 我们应该开发自然资源。

sentences.en: What the media should not do is to exploit people's natural fears.
sentences.cn: 媒体不应该利用人们天生的恐惧心理。

words.tran_cn: 自然的（等于naturalistic）；自然主义的；博物学的
自然的；自然主义的；博物学的
归化的；入籍的；[动] 自然化的；驯化的
自然主义；本能行动；自然论
自然主义者；博物学者；（英）动物标本剥制者；买卖玩赏动物的商人
对自然现象的崇拜；裸体主义
使自然化；接受…入国籍；采纳（naturalize的过去式和过去分词）
自然的事情；白痴；本位音

phrases.tran_cn: 自然频率，固有频率；本盏率
自然选择；[生]物竞天择说

trans.tran_cn: 自然的，意料之中的，出于本性的，天赋的，轻松自如的，天然的，亲生的，非婚生的，本位音的
trans.tran_en: existing in nature and not caused, made, or controlled by people
a musical note that has been changed from a flat to be a semitone higher, or from a sharp to be a semitone lower
